description: Manages a V2 listener resource within HuaweiCloud.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

AdminStateUp.description:
The administrative state of the Listener.
A valid value is true (UP) or false (DOWN).

ConnectionLimit.description:
The maximum number of connections allowed
for the Listener.

DefaultPoolId.description:
The ID of the default pool with which the
Listener is associated. Changing this creates a new Listener.

DefaultTlsContainerRef.description:
A reference to a Barbican Secrets
container which stores TLS information. This is required if the protocol
is `TERMINATED_HTTPS`. See
[here](https://wiki.openstack.org/wiki/Network/LBaaS/docs/how-to-create-tls-loadbalancer)
for more information.

LoadbalancerId.description:
The load balancer on which to provision this
Listener. Changing this creates a new Listener.

Name.description:
Human-readable name for the Listener. Does not have
to be unique.

Protocol.description:
The protocol - can either be TCP, HTTP, HTTPS or TERMINATED_HTTPS.
Changing this creates a new Listener.

ProtocolPort.description:
The port on which to listen for client traffic.
Changing this creates a new Listener.

Region.description:
The region in which to obtain the V2 Networking client.
A Networking client is needed to create an . If omitted, the
`region` argument of the provider is used. Changing this creates a new
Listener.

SniContainerRefs.description:
A list of references to Barbican Secrets
containers which store SNI information. See
[here](https://wiki.openstack.org/wiki/Network/LBaaS/docs/how-to-create-tls-loadbalancer)
for more information.

TenantId.description:
Required for admins. The UUID of the tenant who owns
the Listener.  Only administrative users can specify a tenant UUID
other than their own. Changing this creates a new Listener.
